author: Thibaut (Guest)
title: From The Author
text:
As a fairly new user, i recommend you try Ubuntu, PCLinuxOs and Foresight, all 3 are nice, solid desktop.
I still use ubuntu at work, and love Foresight on my laptop.

author: Akshay (Guest)
title: My 2 cents.
text:
Very nice article. I switched to linux about six months back or so. Feisty fawn being my first linux distro ever.
So learning so much about other distros is really great. The second one I have tried so far is damnsmalllinux on my pen drive. You have probably heard of it before. Great for embedding i guess but as far as desktops are concerned, i am pretty sure ubuntu is a better choice for me. Am gonna try foresight though.
